com.zhuinden.simplestack.navigator

Class Navigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhuinden.simplestack.navigator.Navigator

  • public class Navigator
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience class to hide lifecycle integration using retained fragment. Essentially, a replacement for BackstackDelegate. It can be either configured via configure(), or installed with default settings using install(Activity, ViewGroup, List).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Navigator.Installer
      A configurer for Navigator.

    • Method Summary

      Creates an Navigator.Installer to configure the Navigator.

      If Navigator.Installer.setDeferredInitialization(boolean) was set to true, then this will initialize the backstack using the state changer.
      static Backstack getBackstack(android.content.Context context)
      Gets the backstack that belongs to the Activity which hosts the backstack.
      static BackstackManager getManager(android.content.Context context)
      A method to return the backstack manager, managed by the BackstackHost.

      Get the saved state for a given key.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static Navigator.Installer configure()
        Creates an Navigator.Installer to configure the Navigator.
        Returns:
        the installer

      • install

        public static void install(android.app.Activity activity,
                           android.view.ViewGroup container,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.Object> initialKeys)
        Installs the Navigator with default parameters. This means that DefaultStateChanger and DefaultStateClearStrategy are used.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity which will host the backstack
        container - the container in which custom viewgroups are hosted (to save its child's state in onSaveInstanceState())
        initialKeys - the keys used to initialize the backstack

      • executeDeferredInitialization

        public static void executeDeferredInitialization(android.content.Context context)
        If Navigator.Installer.setDeferredInitialization(boolean) was set to true, then this will initialize the backstack using the state changer.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to which an activity belongs that hosts the backstack

      • getBackstack

        public static Backstack getBackstack(android.content.Context context)
        Gets the backstack that belongs to the Activity which hosts the backstack.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        the backstack

      • onBackPressed

        public static boolean onBackPressed(android.content.Context context)
        Delegates back press call to the backstack of the navigator.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context that belongs to an Activity which hosts the backstack.
        Returns:
        true if a state change was handled or is in progress, false otherwise

      • getManager

        public static BackstackManager getManager(android.content.Context context)
        A method to return the backstack manager, managed by the BackstackHost. Typically not needed.
        Returns:
        the managed backstack manager that belongs to the BackstackHost inside the activity.

      • persistViewToState

        public static void persistViewToState(android.view.View view)
        Persists the view hierarchy state and optional StateBundle.
        Parameters:
        view - the view (can be Bundleable)

      • restoreViewFromState

        public static void restoreViewFromState(android.view.View view)
        Restores the view hierarchy state and optional StateBundle.
        Parameters:
        view - the view (can be Bundleable)

      • getSavedState

        public static SavedState getSavedState(android.content.Context context,
                                       java.lang.Object key)
        Get the saved state for a given key.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to which an Activity belongs that hosts a backstack
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the saved state
